a person affected with a developmental disorder (such as autism or intellectual disability) who exhibits exceptional skill or brilliance in some limited field (such as mathematics or music); especially : autistic savant

dt.t: She is not just autistic but an {wi}autistic savant{/wi}, meaning that she has unusual cognitive abilities, such as a photographic memory and excellent spatial skills.

shortdef: a person affected with autism who exhibits exceptional skill or brilliance in some limited field (such as mathematics or music)
